snippet.title: Humble Monthly December 2018 Humble Original: Cut & Run
snippet.description:
BREAKING NEWS: A meteor is approaching New Cut City in 5 business days!

Now is your chance to become rich and famous by saving the city with ... a sword that grows bigger with every cut!

Cut & Run is an arcade adventure game where you run around the city cutting everything and anything ranging from
an alarm clock to an entire building.

Can you get your sword big enough to stop the meteor from destroying your town?

Debuting in December 2018's Humble Monthly.
https://www.humblebundle.com/monthly
